name: Zombie Driver HD Demo
supported_languages: English, French, German, Italian, Polish, Spanish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/Vista/XP
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz dual core processor
  • Memory: 512 MB
  • Graphics: 128 MB DirectX 9.0c compatible or better video card with pixelshader 3.0
  • DirectX®: DirectX 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 2 GB
  • Sound: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/Vista/XP
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz dual core processor
  • Memory: 1 GB
  • Graphics: 128 MB DirectX 9.0c compatible or better video card with pixelshader 3.0
  • DirectX®: DirectX 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 2 GB
  • Sound: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
